tags: thx for coming to my ted talk
summary: For people who are upset that Harry Potter “only uses one spell”
title: For people who are upset that Harry Potter “only uses one spell”
body:
I have experienced so many fans, who are outraged and annoyed at the fact that Harry James Potter only seems to use one spell against his enemies. Expelliarmus. Often people are like “why doesn´t he use something else every once in a while” or “why use that spell?” or “Damn it Harry, expelliarmus isn´t the only spell, you jock!” But I get it. I think I understand why Harry uses expelliarmus and perhaps I would prefer the same spell.

Harry may be the target of the Dark Lord himself and have many enemies, but despite this.. Harry is his mother´s son. He has a good heart. He doesn´t wish to kill or hurt or in other ways inflict pain on another person or anything that could affect them physically and their quality of life. He only means to disarm them, which is honestly probably the most peaceful and harmless way to end a conflict. You disarm someone and they can´t attack you, but you also don´t hurt them, so they´re fine. They have the chance to move on with their lives. Harry is not like Voldemort. He actually cares about people and he doesn´t want to become a killer or torturer even if they might deserve it. After Bellatrix killed Harry´s godfather Sirius Black, he couldn´t even use the Cruciatus Curse on Bellatrix, because he didn´t mean it. Voldemort said he had to mean it and thats why Harry couldn´t do it. 

So please give Harry a break. He´s just trying his best.

summary:
Hermione: Are you going to invite Malfoy to the party?
Harry: What? Why would I do such a thing? As if I like him or...
body:
Hermione: Are you going to invite Malfoy to the party?
Harry: What? Why would I do such a thing? As if I like him or something!
Ron: Mate, we know you're secretly dating
Harry: You know?
Hermione: You're not as subtle as you think

summary:
Dumbledore: There was this rather sociopathic kid I once had in my 
classes and he's ridiculously powerful, gaining even more...
body:
Dumbledore: There was this rather sociopathic kid I once had in my classes and he’s ridiculously powerful, gaining even more power with his followers, showing more and more fascist tendencies. I might be capable of stopping him. Should I do something?

Dumbledore: …

Dumbledore: Nah.

~ A few years later ~

Dumbledore: There might one day be some sort of prophecy about a child who’s lost everyone close to them to a fascist murder wizard I didn’t kill when I had the chance. I will leave everything to this child that might be born once, giving them only cryptic instructions.

Dumbledore: …

Dumbledore: I’m awesome.

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

title: I Am The Son
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DcspfP

by SableUnstable

In a bid to bring back the only person who ever loved him, Draco Malfoy dives deep into dangerously unknown ancient magic. What he doesn’t expect, however, is to earn the eternal gratitude of The Boy Who Lived in the process.

Words: 1637, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M

title: List 5 OTPs and Tag 5 People
body:
List 5 OTPs and tag 5 People
Tagged by @siderealsandman

I have too many to list ;-; so I won’t be doing any two from the same series (even if I ship them the same amount)

1) Red Duo (Akira(P5)/Minako(P3)) this cross game pairing is a new one but I love it with all my heart <3 it’s probably the weirdest out of all of them but like? I Love Them.

2) Hinny (Harry/Ginny) I’ve been in love with the Harry/Ginny ship since I first read the Harry Potter books, it’s had some of the best stories I’ve ever read written for it!

3) Monochrome or Checkmate (Weiss/Blake) Pretty much the only reason I stick around the RWBY fandom anymore is for these two, they were the first couple I wrote something for, unfortunately not the first couple I ever read something for.

4) Catradora (Catra/Adora) SPOP is like, totally amazing and I can’t wait for more. These two just have so much potential to be amazing it makes my heart burst.

5) ShizNat (Shizuru/Natsuki) my FIRST OTP ever of all time, I’ve never actually watched MaiHime or MaiOtome but I love them all the same. They were the first couple I ever read fanfiction for, but I never got around to writing stuff for them :(

Honorable Mentions: Me/My Darling Cupcake, IzuOcha, AkiHaru, SoMa, Marichat, Starco, and a whole bunch of other ones that I’m forgetting 
The Five(5) people I’m tagging arrrre… @disney-n-stuff @dvvkroh @elphabaforpresidentofgallifrey @fightfortherightsofhouseelves @theforceisstrongwiththisurl
